product_name: White Sierra Crystal Cove River Shorts - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: The White Sierra Crystal Cove River shorts easily transition from water-filled to landlocked adventures. Moisture-wicking and quick-drying nylon fabric is soft and comfortable. Fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Elastic waist for a great fit. Zippered thigh pocket, side cargo pockets with flap closures and hand pockets. Special buy.
